: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw picked up the uncouncious form of KitKat, flinging her over his shoulder. Someone would think that if he wanted to protect her so much that he would feel bad about doing this. He didn't. The tough Predacon assassin part of him showing through.
SharpClaw takes her inside. SharpClaw doesn't know where to take her so he ends up in his quarters. He lays her out on the bed. She would be out for some time.
SharpClaw locks the door, makeing sure that only he could open it. He then rested on the couch. He started to sleep as well...
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat:;

She was caught off her guard.  The fist hit her jaw and she fell to 
the floor. She lay in wolf mode, out cold.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw: I see your delima, and I believe I have a solution to 
the problem.
> SharpClaw sends a right hook at KitKat's jaw. He wants to knock her 
out. SharpClaw doesn't understand why, but he feels that he should 
keep this bot safe.
